descrizione: Teaching Portal of the Polytechnic University of Turin

homepage.cd_tooltip: Through the annual personal study plan, you can access the pages of individual courses
homepage.preferiti_tooltip: The services selected as favorites (through the ★ icon) will appear here
homepage.agenda_tooltip: Through the agenda, you can view lessons, exams, deadlines, and reservations
homepage.avvisi_tooltip: List of notices published in the last 7 days

didattica.appelli_prenotati_tooltip: View and manage reservations for available exams
didattica.vc_tooltip: List that allows access to recent virtual classrooms, recorded by teachers
didattica.materiale_condiviso_tooltip: This service allows access to material published by teachers, made available to all students
didattica.materiale_condiviso_descrizione: No educational material selected. You can add new material to this section by searching for it among that shared publicly through "Search in shared material".
didattica.ricerca_orari_placeholder: Enter the name of the course...
didattica.cdl_descrizione: Section dedicated exclusively to the uploading and verification of language certifications required by the course of study. For recognition of additional language proficiency use the "External Activity Approval" service within the "Career Management" section.
didattica.verifica_lingua_inglese: Check your current level of knowledge via vLAIB
didattica.lingua_italiana_descrizione: Before registering for the PLIDA exam, please read these instructions:
didattica.lingua_italiana_descrizione_link: Is my PLIDA registration successfully completed?
didattica.altre_lingue_descrizione: These level tests for the French, Portuguese, Spanish and German languages can be accessed at any time. They can be taken remotely by all students at Politecnico di Torino. If you are a student selected under the Politecnico di Torino's ERASMUS+ and Extra-UE/NON ERASMUS+ Mobility Competitions, please read the instructions at
